fgo:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
fgo:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

SuitcaseFgo.NAME: Suitcase
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b20% #yfgomaster:NP.

HalloweenRoyalty.NAME: Mystic Code
HalloweenRoyalty.FLAVOR: A prestigious and noble product. Now you can be the (Halloween) Crown Prince!
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 turns, use Mystic Code's Master skill.
Every #b5 turns, use Mystic Code's Master skill(+).

CommandSpell.NAME: Command Spell
CommandSpell.FLAVOR: Command Spells are extremely powerful magic granted to each Master.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yfgomaster:Command_Spell are the three absolute commands which can be used with the #yRight click in Battle.

SurpriseChocolate.NAME: Surprise Chocolate
SurpriseChocolate.FLAVOR: The first time seems like just an attempt... let's do it again!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 random buff.

LockChocolate.NAME: Lock Chocolate
LockChocolate.FLAVOR: Make a choice and give it to someone important to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yfgomaster:Evil_Curse.

LockChocolateStrawberry.NAME: Lock Chocolate Strawberry
LockChocolateStrawberry.FLAVOR: Carefully select the recipient of the gift.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, add a #yWall #yof #ySnow #yFlakes and #yBlack #yBarrel to your deck.

AstrologicalTeapot.NAME: Astrological Teapot
AstrologicalTeapot.FLAVOR: Drink it and deepen the bonds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a potion, gain #b
#yfgomaster:Guts.

SaveStone.NAME: Save Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #yGold equal to your #b
% #yGold.

BlessRockChoco.NAME: Blessed Lock-On Choco
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card is at or above #b3, reduce its cost by #b1 this turn.

PoisonApple.NAME: Poison Apple
PoisonApple.FLAVOR: An apple that looks suspicious no matter how it looks. The person who takes this and is willing to eat it must be a super good person.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yBlock, apply #b1 #yPoison to a random enemy.

MisoPotato.NAME: Miso Potato
MisoPotato.FLAVOR: Smuggled from the ZHIFU Mountains and circulated as simple food on the black market.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yIt's #yInevitable apply #b2 #yfgomaster:Combust to ALL enemies for each damage.

FanNight.NAME: Fan Night
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you break an enemy's #yBlock the first time each combat, heal for #b20% of your MAX HP.

BurgerKing.NAME: Burger King
BurgerKing.FLAVOR: Since protein can be converted into muscle, that's definitely 0 calories.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b40 and obtain a unique #rCurse.

DreamChip.NAME: Dream Chip
DreamChip.FLAVOR: A luxurious casino chip carrying dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile the first time each combat, add a #yCalculated #yGamble into your hand.

CosmicMedallion.NAME: Cosmic Medallion
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is not removed at the start of your next #b3 turn.

MidsummerNightDream.NAME: Midsummer Night Dream
MidsummerNightDream.FLAVOR: While these visions did appear. And this weak and idle theme, no more yielding but a dream.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer become #yfgomaster:Evil_Curse.

Salem.NAME: Existence Outside the Domain
DESCRIPTIONS: For each #rForeigner in your deck, at the start of each turn gain #b
#yVigor.
You have no #rForeigner.
You have #b
#rCurses.

SkullCandy.NAME: Skull Candy
SkullCandy.FLAVOR: Candy that has been resold multiple times.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrade your Mystic Code's Master skill.

ArchetypeORT.NAME: Archetype ORT
ArchetypeORT.FLAVOR: 使用ORT的心脏与星际外来种融合制作（设计）出来的生命体。
DESCRIPTIONS: Converts your #yfgomaster:Invincibility to #yfgomaster:Anti-Purge_Defense. At the start of your 2nd turn and after each turn, gain #b10 fgomaster:Stars and #b3% fgomaster:NP.

Avenger.NAME: Avenger
Avenger.FLAVOR: 作为复仇者，人的怨恨和怨念集于一身形成的技能。
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked, gain additional #yfgomaster:NP equal to #b30% damaged. At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yFrail.

OblivionCorrection.NAME: Oblivion Correction
OblivionCorrection.FLAVOR: 虽然人是很健忘的生物，但是复仇者绝不会忘却。
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b30% #yfgomaster:Critical.

SelfReplenishmentMagic.NAME: Self-Replenishment (Magic)
SelfReplenishmentMagic.FLAVOR: 直到复仇完成为止，魔力会不断涌出。
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain additional #b6% #yfgomaster:NP.

BB.NAME: BB
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain Buff or Debuff. Buff: gain #b2 #yStrength and #yDexterity. Debuff: gain #b1 #yVulnerable, #yFrail or #yWeak.

BowInsignia.NAME: Bow Insignia
BowInsignia.FLAVOR: A seal engraved with the Archer emblem.

MechanicalProtector.NAME: Mechanical Protector
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Power card for #b3 times, a random enemy #yStunned.
This relic has been used up.
